article_title: Text Shots From The World Healthcare Congress

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: What follows is a series of "text shots" -- quick paragraphs in between a tweet and a blog post -- that describe the big ideas I heard at last week’s 2015 World Healthcare Congress in DC: a quick paragraph for each. I will expand the more promising ideas in later posts.
